quiz_title: What kind of super hero are you?

questions.question: What is your preferred superpower?
Which superhero gadget would you choose?
How would you use your powers for good?

options.option: Protecting the innocent and fighting villains
Enforcing justice and upholding the law
Using my powers for humanitarian missions

questions.question: What is your preferred method of transportation?

options.option: Swinging through the city on webs

questions.question: What is your greatest personal value?
How do you handle difficult moral choices?

options.option: Follow my instincts and do what feels right
Analyze the situation and make a logical decision
Seek advice from trusted mentors or allies
Consider the greater good and act accordingly

questions.question: What motivates you to be a hero?

options.option: Protecting loved ones and making the world safer
Helping others reach their full potential
Bringing justice to the world and fighting injustice
Making a positive impact on people's lives

questions.question: How do you approach teamwork and collaboration?

options.option: Take charge and lead the team to victory
Offer guidance and support to team members
Adhere to rules and coordinate efforts efficiently
Adapt quickly and assist others whenever needed

questions.question: What is your preferred fighting style?

options.option: Speed and agility combined with quick strikes

questions.question: How do you handle adversity and setbacks?

options.option: Push through with sheer determination and strength
Analyze the situation and find a clever solution
Stay focused and follow established protocols
Adapt quickly and use speed to overcome challenges

results.title: The Mighty Protector
results.description: You are a powerhouse of strength and courage. With your incredible might, you protect the innocent and fight against evil forces. Your unwavering determination and indomitable spirit inspire others to believe in the strength of justice.

results.title: The Mind Maven
results.description: You possess incredible mental abilities, allowing you to read minds and tap into the vast knowledge of the universe. As the Mind Maven, you guide and mentor others, using your wisdom and insight to help them navigate through life's challenges.

results.title: The Soaring Aviator
results.description: You are blessed with the ability to take flight and soar through the skies. As the Soaring Aviator, you enforce justice and uphold the law, using your aerial prowess to keep the world safe from threats. Your unwavering commitment to truth and order inspires others to strive for a better future.

results.title: The Speedster
results.description: You possess lightning-fast speed, allowing you to zip through life with incredible agility. As the Speedster, you utilize your powers for humanitarian missions, helping those in need and making a positive impact on the world. Your selflessness and quick thinking make you a true hero.

quiz_title: Who are you in Star Wars?

questions.question: Which aspect of the Force appeals to you the most?
Which lightsaber color would you wield?
What is your preferred method of combat?
How would you describe your personality?
What motivates you in life?
Which Star Wars planet would you most like to visit?
Who is your favorite Star Wars villain?
What type of starship would you pilot?
Which character trait is most important to you?
How do you handle difficult decisions?

results.title: The Jedi Master
results.description: You are a wise and calm individual, in tune with the light side of the Force. As a Jedi Master, you possess exceptional telekinetic abilities and are known for your deep understanding of the Force. Your wisdom and serenity guide others on the path of righteousness.

results.title: The Sith Lord
results.description: You are an ambitious and cunning individual, embracing the dark side of the Force. As a Sith Lord, you wield the power of mind control and seek to impose your will on the galaxy. Your hunger for power and mastery over the Force knows no bounds.

results.title: The Adventurous Scoundrel
results.description: You have an adventurous and reckless spirit, always seeking excitement and thrills in the galaxy. As an Adventurous Scoundrel, you rely on your quick reflexes and teleportation abilities to navigate dangerous situations. Your charm and roguish nature make you a beloved character.

results.title: The Honorable Knight
results.description: You are a loyal and honorable individual, dedicated to upholding justice and defending the weak. As an Honorable Knight, you excel in lightsaber combat and fight for the ideals of the Jedi Order. Your unwavering loyalty and sense of honor inspire others to fight for what is right.

quiz_title: What is your Lord of the Rings lookalike

questions.question: Which race of Middle-earth do you feel most connected to?
What is your preferred weapon of choice?
How would you describe your personality?
Which location in Middle-earth would you most like to visit?
If you could possess one of the Rings of Power, which would you choose?
Which character from the Fellowship of the Ring do you admire the most?
What is your favorite aspect of Middle-earth's lore and history?

options.option: The rise and fall of kingdoms
The simple joys of Hobbit life

questions.question: In a dire situation, what would be your first instinct?
Which of the Rings of Power would you trust the most?
If you were granted one wish in Middle-earth, what would it be?

results.title: The Elven Guardian
results.description: You are a graceful and wise being, deeply connected to nature and the power of the Elves. As an Elven Guardian, you possess incredible archery skills and are known for your wisdom and insight. Your presence brings a sense of tranquility and hope.

results.title: The Dwarven Warrior
results.description: You are a determined and loyal warrior, hailing from the noble race of Dwarves. With your mighty axe or hammer in hand, you fearlessly face any challenge. Your loyalty and steadfastness make you a trusted companion and protector.

results.title: The Human Knight
results.description: You embody courage and nobility, belonging to the race of Men. As a Human Knight, you wield a sword with honor and fight for justice. Your bravery and leadership inspire others to stand against darkness and fight for a better future.

results.title: The Hobbit Adventurer
results.description: You are a cheerful and adventurous Hobbit, known for your love of good food, comfort, and a simple life. Yet, deep inside, you possess a spirit of curiosity and bravery. Your small stature belies your courage and resourcefulness.
